Current.label: Current Value
Current.tooltip: Set the current value of the goal

CurrentUpdate.label: Update Current Value
CurrentUpdate.tooltip: Updates the current value if checked

Title.label: Goal Title
Title.tooltip: Title of the goal. Updates goal with [Order] if empty

addToList.label: Add or update this goal?
addToList.tooltip: Check to add this goal to the list instead of putting it as the current goal. Or update / delete an existing goal

btnClear.label: Clear All Data
btnClear.tooltip: Clears all goals and storage of the overlay

btnCopyPath1.label: Copy HTML Path
btnCopyPath1.tooltip: Copies the path to the html file to the clipboard

btnCopyPath2.label: Copy HTML Path
btnCopyPath2.tooltip: Copies the path to the html file to the clipboard

btnEditBulk.label: Edit Bulk File
btnEditBulk.tooltip: Opens the file for bulk import of donation goals in the system's default editor

btnImportBulk.label: Import Bulk Data
btnImportBulk.tooltip: Import the goals from the file and replace all goals in the list

btnTestBits.label: Test bits
btnTestBits.tooltip: Sends fake cheer event to test progress bar

btnTestDonation.label: Test Donation
btnTestDonation.tooltip: Sends fake donation event to test progress bar

cycleTime.label: Goal Cycle Time
cycleTime.tooltip: Time in seconds until the goals are switched after the current one is completed

goalRepeat.label: Repeat Goals if Cleared Multiple Times at Once?
goalRepeat.tooltip: Goals that would get completed more than once with the last donation will be repeated automatically. Option to switch to the next goal after the repetition or to still keep the current goal

handleListDone.label: Behavior after goal list is completed
handleListDone.tooltip: Sets how the goal bar behaves after all goals are completed
